llmDecision.text: ThisUX Design Studio (the UX/UI design studio behind ThisUX) is run by Sanju S, who is the founder and CEO of the studio. He leads the design-led product studio and works on product design, UX/UI and development projects under the ThisUX brand. Additionally, the underlying company Thisux Private Limited — the legal entity associated with the studio — lists Sivalingam Raghul and Sivalingam Sanjay as its directors as per official company records in India. So in summary: • Sanju S — Founder & CEO driving the design studio’s creative direction and product work. • Sivalingam Raghul and Sivalingam Sanjay — Directors of the corporate entity Thisux Private Limited.
